mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.SENSORDATA (PARTNO, PROCESSNO, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, INTEGRITY) values (#{partno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{integrity,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select PARTNO, PROCESSNO, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, INTEGRITY from WISDOM.SENSORDATA
